original_text:
Million 777
Million 777 è una slot machine prodotta dalla software house Red Rake che, sebbene a qualcuno possa risultare non troppo familiare, ha sfornato dei giochi davvero interessanti!
Tra questi annoveriamo senza ombra di dubbio Million 777, che riesce a coniugare una grafica e una tematica assolutamente tradizionali con un gameplay incredibile e tantissime possibilità di vincita!
Il tema è quello classico per eccellenza: ci troviamo infatti davanti a una Fruit Machine, il gioco che ha fatto la storia delle slot e che resiste alle nuove tematiche e alle nuove tecnologie, risultando sempre molto gradita a una folta schiera di nostalgici e non.
Sui rulli di Million 777 troviamo i simboli classici della tradizione delle slot fruttate: ci sono i frutti colorati, ci sono le scritte BAR, la campanella e, ovviamente, il numero 7.
Con queste premesse, potrebbe trattarsi benissimo di una delle tante Fruit Machine moderne che non mancano nei cataloghi di tutte le software house, invece ci troviamo davanti a un prodotto che nasconde tante sorprese e che promette di tenervi incollati davanti allo schermo.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine: il gameplay
Tenetevi forte mentre andiamo alla scoperta del gameplay di Million 777, troverete delle incredibili possibilità di vincita e tantissimo divertimento!
Partiamo con la griglia di gioco, che è enorme e occupa quasi tutto lo schermo, essendo costituita da 6 rulli e da bel 10 righe! Ma non finisce qui, le modalità di vincita sono infatti 1.000.000, si, avete capito bene, un milione, e cambiano in base al numero di simboli che sono visualizzati sulla griglia.
Per vincere bisogna ottenere una combinazione di simboli uguali su almeno tre dei sei rulli, a prescindere dalla riga in cui si trovano.
Potete puntare su Million 777 una scommessa che va da un minimo di 20 centesimi fino a un massimo di 50 €.
Oltre alla griglia di gioco classica trovate anche diversi pannelli ai lati di questa che corrispondono a diverse funzioni speciali, grazie alle quali potrete incrementare ulteriormente le chance di vittoria.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore o RTP di Million 777 si attesta su un canonico 95,3%.
Simboli e funzionalità speciali di Million 777
I simboli sono quelli classici della tradizione delle Fruit Machine e potrete scoprirne il valore cliccando sulla tabella dei pagamenti.
Le funzionalità speciali sono tante: un contatore che si trova ai lati della griglia si riempie progressivamente di monete e sblocca il 777 Minigame, una serie di giri in cui compaiono solo monete, con valore di moltiplicatori. Alla fine dei giri sarete ripagati con il valore delle monete comparse.
Troviamo poi svariati moltiplicatori, da x2 a x10 se compaiono i simboli fortunati, rappresentati da dei ferri di cavallo.
Infine, potrete usufruire di altre funzioni speciali quando sui rulli vedrete apparire tre o più pile di banconote o i 7 d’oro e d’argento.

raw_translation.response:
Million 777: A Slot Machine Worth Playing

Million 777 is a Red Rake production that might not be a household name yet, but they have managed to create some really interesting games.
Among them is Million 777, which combines a traditional theme and graphics with incredible gameplay and many opportunities to win big!
The classic Fruit Machine theme includes colorful fruits, bar symbols, bells, and of course, the lucky number 7.
But don't let its traditional appearance fool you, Million 777 is packed with surprises and promises to keep you glued to the screen.
Get ready for the immense gameplay with a huge grid consisting of 6 reels and 10 rows. There are 1,000,000 different ways to win, depending on the symbols displayed on the grid.
You can bet on Million 777 with a minimum of 20 cents and a maximum of €50.
Besides the classic game grid, there are several special functions on panels at the sides of the screen to increase your chances of winning.
With a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 95.3%, Million 777 provides players with a fair chance to win while playing.
Discover the classic fruit machine symbols and their value by clicking on the payout table. Get ready for the many special features, including a coin counter that gradually fills up and unlocks the 777 Minigame, a series of spins that include only coins with multiplier values. Also, find the lucky horseshoe symbols that give you various multipliers from x2 to x10. Lastly, watch out for three or more stacks of banknotes or the golden and silver 7 symbols that provide exciting special functions on the game panel. 

If you’re an experienced gambler and enjoy traditional fruit machines, Million 777 is the slot game for you. Exciting gameplay, many ways to win, and special functions make this game worth playing. Try your luck today and who knows, maybe you will hit the jackpot!

raw_translation.response:
Million 777
Million 777 is a slot machine produced by the software house Red Rake that, although unfamiliar to some, has produced some truly interesting games! Among these, undoubtedly, we have Million 777, which manages to combine absolutely traditional graphics and themes with incredible gameplay and endless possibilities for winning big! 

The theme is the classic fruit machine by excellence: we are in front of a game that has made the history of slots and that resists new themes and technologies, always being very popular among a large number of nostalgic and non-nostalgic players. On the reels of Million 777, we find classic symbols of the fruity slots tradition: there are colored fruits, the "BAR" signs, the bell, and, of course, the number 7. 

With these premises, it could well be one of the many modern fruit machines that are not lacking in the catalogs of all software houses. Instead, we're looking at a product that hides many surprises and promises to keep you glued to the screen. 

Main features of the slot machine: gameplay
Hold on tight as we explore Million 777's gameplay, you'll find incredible possibilities for winning big and endless fun! 

Let's start with the game grid, which is enormous and occupies almost the entire screen, having 6 reels and 10 paylines! But that's not all, the winning ways, in fact, are 1,000,000, yes, you read that right, one million, and they change based on the number of symbols that are displayed on the grid.

To win, you need to obtain a combination of identical symbols on at least three of the six reels, regardless of the payline. You can bet on Million 777 with a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €50. 

In addition to the classic game grid, you'll also find several panels on either side of it that correspond to different special features, thanks to which you can further increase your chances of winning. The theoretical return to player or RTP of Million 777 is 95.3%, which is the norm. 

Symbols and special functions of Million 777
The symbols are the classic ones of the fruit machine tradition, and you can discover their value by clicking on the paytable. The special features are many: a counter on the sides of the grid fills up progressively with coins and unlocks the 777 Minigame, a series of spins in which only coins appear, with multiplication values. At the end of the spins, you'll be paid the value of the coins that appeared.

Then we have various multipliers, from x2 to x10, if the lucky symbols, represented by horseshoes, appear. Finally, you can take advantage of other special functions when you see three or more stacks of banknotes or the golden and silver number 7s on the reels. 

Don't miss out on the chance to play Million 777, the perfect combination of traditional graphics and themes with surprising gameplay and big wins!

message.content:
Million 777
Million 777 is a slot machine produced by the software house Red Rake that, although unfamiliar to some, has produced some truly interesting games! Among these, undoubtedly, we have Million 777, which manages to combine absolutely traditional graphics and themes with incredible gameplay and endless possibilities for winning big! 

The theme is the classic fruit machine by excellence: we are in front of a game that has made the history of slots and that resists new themes and technologies, always being very popular among a large number of nostalgic and non-nostalgic players. On the reels of Million 777, we find classic symbols of the fruity slots tradition: there are colored fruits, the "BAR" signs, the bell, and, of course, the number 7. 

With these premises, it could well be one of the many modern fruit machines that are not lacking in the catalogs of all software houses. Instead, we're looking at a product that hides many surprises and promises to keep you glued to the screen. 

Main features of the slot machine: gameplay
Hold on tight as we explore Million 777's gameplay, you'll find incredible possibilities for winning big and endless fun! 

Let's start with the game grid, which is enormous and occupies almost the entire screen, having 6 reels and 10 paylines! But that's not all, the winning ways, in fact, are 1,000,000, yes, you read that right, one million, and they change based on the number of symbols that are displayed on the grid.

To win, you need to obtain a combination of identical symbols on at least three of the six reels, regardless of the payline. You can bet on Million 777 with a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €50. 

In addition to the classic game grid, you'll also find several panels on either side of it that correspond to different special features, thanks to which you can further increase your chances of winning. The theoretical return to player or RTP of Million 777 is 95.3%, which is the norm. 

Symbols and special functions of Million 777
The symbols are the classic ones of the fruit machine tradition, and you can discover their value by clicking on the paytable. The special features are many: a counter on the sides of the grid fills up progressively with coins and unlocks the 777 Minigame, a series of spins in which only coins appear, with multiplication values. At the end of the spins, you'll be paid the value of the coins that appeared.

Then we have various multipliers, from x2 to x10, if the lucky symbols, represented by horseshoes, appear. Finally, you can take advantage of other special functions when you see three or more stacks of banknotes or the golden and silver number 7s on the reels. 

Don't miss out on the chance to play Million 777, the perfect combination of traditional graphics and themes with surprising gameplay and big wins!

Review: Million 777
Million 777 is a slot machine produced by the software house Red Rake that, although unfamiliar to some, has produced some truly interesting games! Among these, undoubtedly, we have Million 777, which manages to combine absolutely traditional graphics and themes with incredible gameplay and endless possibilities for winning big! 

The theme is the classic fruit machine by excellence: we are in front of a game that has made the history of slots and that resists new themes and technologies, always being very popular among a large number of nostalgic and non-nostalgic players. On the reels of Million 777, we find classic symbols of the fruity slots tradition: there are colored fruits, the "BAR" signs, the bell, and, of course, the number 7. 

With these premises, it could well be one of the many modern fruit machines that are not lacking in the catalogs of all software houses. Instead, we're looking at a product that hides many surprises and promises to keep you glued to the screen. 

Main features of the slot machine: gameplay
Hold on tight as we explore Million 777's gameplay, you'll find incredible possibilities for winning big and endless fun! 

Let's start with the game grid, which is enormous and occupies almost the entire screen, having 6 reels and 10 paylines! But that's not all, the winning ways, in fact, are 1,000,000, yes, you read that right, one million, and they change based on the number of symbols that are displayed on the grid.

To win, you need to obtain a combination of identical symbols on at least three of the six reels, regardless of the payline. You can bet on Million 777 with a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €50. 

In addition to the classic game grid, you'll also find several panels on either side of it that correspond to different special features, thanks to which you can further increase your chances of winning. The theoretical return to player or RTP of Million 777 is 95.3%, which is the norm. 

Symbols and special functions of Million 777
The symbols are the classic ones of the fruit machine tradition, and you can discover their value by clicking on the paytable. The special features are many: a counter on the sides of the grid fills up progressively with coins and unlocks the 777 Minigame, a series of spins in which only coins appear, with multiplication values. At the end of the spins, you'll be paid the value of the coins that appeared.

Then we have various multipliers, from x2 to x10, if the lucky symbols, represented by horseshoes, appear. Finally, you can take advantage of other special functions when you see three or more stacks of banknotes or the golden and silver number 7s on the reels. 

Don't miss out on the chance to play Million 777, the perfect combination of traditional graphics and themes with surprising gameplay and big wins!

Gameplay mechanics and rules

Million 777 is a classic fruit machine with 6 reels and 10 paylines. The winning ways are 1,000,000 and change based on the number of symbols that appear on the grid. Return to player percentage (RTP)

Theoretical return to player or RTP of Million 777 is 95.3%, which is within the average range for slot machines. This means that for every €100 wagered, the game pays out €95.30 over time. faq.question: What is Million 777?
faq.answer: Million 777 is a slot machine game produced by Red Rake that combines traditional graphics and themes with innovative gameplay and big winning possibilities.

faq.question: What is the game theme?
faq.answer: The game theme is the classic fruit machine with traditional symbols including 7s, BAR signs, bells, and fruits.

faq.question: What is the game grid like?
faq.answer: The game grid is large with 6 reels and 10 paylines. It has 1,000,000 winning ways that change depending on the symbols displayed.

faq.question: What is the minimum and maximum bet on Million 777?
faq.answer: You can bet on Million 777 with a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €50.

faq.question: What is the theoretical RTP of the game?
faq.answer: The theoretical return to player (RTP) of Million 777 is 95.3%.

faq.question: What are the special features of Million 777?
faq.answer: There are many special features including a counter that unlocks the 777 Minigame, multipliers, and other special functions activated by banknotes and golden and silver number 7s on the reels.

faq.question: What is the 777 Minigame?
faq.answer: The 777 Minigame is a series of spins in which only coins appear, with multiplication values. At the end of the spins, the player is paid the value of the coins that appeared.

faq.question: What is the value of horseshoe symbols in Million 777?
faq.answer: The horseshoe symbols represent lucky symbols that can trigger multipliers ranging from x2 to x10.

Review: Million 777
Million 777 is a slot machine produced by the software house Red Rake that, although unfamiliar to some, has produced some truly interesting games! Among these, undoubtedly, we have Million 777, which manages to combine absolutely traditional graphics and themes with incredible gameplay and endless possibilities for winning big! 

The theme is the classic fruit machine by excellence: we are in front of a game that has made the history of slots and that resists new themes and technologies, always being very popular among a large number of nostalgic and non-nostalgic players. On the reels of Million 777, we find classic symbols of the fruity slots tradition: there are colored fruits, the "BAR" signs, the bell, and, of course, the number 7. 

With these premises, it could well be one of the many modern fruit machines that are not lacking in the catalogs of all software houses. Instead, we're looking at a product that hides many surprises and promises to keep you glued to the screen. 

Main features of the slot machine: gameplay
Hold on tight as we explore Million 777's gameplay, you'll find incredible possibilities for winning big and endless fun! 

Let's start with the game grid, which is enormous and occupies almost the entire screen, having 6 reels and 10 paylines! But that's not all, the winning ways, in fact, are 1,000,000, yes, you read that right, one million, and they change based on the number of symbols that are displayed on the grid.

To win, you need to obtain a combination of identical symbols on at least three of the six reels, regardless of the payline. You can bet on Million 777 with a minimum bet of €0.20 and a maximum of €50. 

In addition to the classic game grid, you'll also find several panels on either side of it that correspond to different special features, thanks to which you can further increase your chances of winning. The theoretical return to player or RTP of Million 777 is 95.3%, which is the norm. 

Symbols and special functions of Million 777
The symbols are the classic ones of the fruit machine tradition, and you can discover their value by clicking on the paytable. The special features are many: a counter on the sides of the grid fills up progressively with coins and unlocks the 777 Minigame, a series of spins in which only coins appear, with multiplication values. At the end of the spins, you'll be paid the value of the coins that appeared.

Then we have various multipliers, from x2 to x10, if the lucky symbols, represented by horseshoes, appear. Finally, you can take advantage of other special functions when you see three or more stacks of banknotes or the golden and silver number 7s on the reels. 

Don't miss out on the chance to play Million 777, the perfect combination of traditional graphics and themes with surprising gameplay and big wins!
